remarks: The subspace of a topological product space induced by a subset with a Cartesian product representation is a topological product of the subspaces induced by the subspaces of the terms of the products. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement: txrest $p |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ S e. W ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. Y ) ) -> ( ( R tX S ) |`t ( A X. B ) ) = ( ( R |`t A ) tX ( S |`t B ) ) ) $.
